comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; Win64; x64; rv:11.0a1) Gecko/20111215 Firefox/11.0a1
Build ID: 20111215031153

Steps to reproduce:

0. Open more than one tab and load a page on each one.
1. Pin a tab as App Tab
2. Hover over FF icon in taskbar
3. Hover over app tab preview


Actual results:

Close button appears on the preview window.


Expected results:

Since there's no close button on app tabs, corresponding previews in aero peek should not have close button either. If Windows API requires a close button (I doubt that), then the button should be grayed out.
